speaker: Agent
text: Hi, this is Paul from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Emily?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Emily. Who is calling?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your overdue balance. Before discussing any details, please confirm your date of birth.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Emily. Now, can you verify your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright. Your outstanding balance is $385. Please let me know when you plan to pay.

speaker: Customer
text: I'll manage a payment by the end of this week.

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks, Emily. And please don't give me any bullshit about missed deadlines.

speaker: Agent
text: Great. I'll follow up with you soon. Goodbye.
